content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Mining Complex at position(-19.0, -50.0) and (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of:
- Two burner mining drills (at -19.0,-50.0 and -15.0,-50.0) mining iron ore
- Two wooden chests collecting iron ore (at -18.5,-48.5 and -14.5,-48.5)

###Copper Mining Complex at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining copper ore
- Wooden chest collecting copper ore (at -27.5,-59.5)

###Iron Smelting Setup at position(0.0, 0.0) and (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces for smelting iron plates
- Input chest at (-2.5, 0.5)
- Output chests at (0.5, 2.5) and (2.5, 2.5)
- Iron ore input chest at (4.5, 0.5)
- Network of burner inserters moving materials between chests and furnaces

###Copper Smelting Setup at position(-6.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace for smelting copper plates
- Currently working with copper ore input

###Electronic Circuit Production at position(13.5, 5.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine for creating electronic circuits
- Input/output system with burner inserters
- Wooden chests at (10.5, 5.5) and (16.5, 5.5)

###Copper Cable Production at position(18.5, 2.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine for creating copper cables
- Input chest at (15.5, 2.5)
- Burner inserter system for material movement

###Power Generation Complex at position(-12.0, 20.5)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (-12.0, 20.5)
- Steam engine at (-8.5, 20.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting water supply
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Errors
- Clear inventory space before attempting to harvest resources
- Craft intermediate products when inventory is full to free up space

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Empty collection chests regularly when they become full
- Monitor mining drill output chests to prevent mining stoppage

### Fuel Management Errors
- Ensure coal is available in inventory before attempting to fuel machines
- Keep track of fuel levels in burner devices

### Item Insertion Errors
- Verify required items are in inventory before attempting insertion
- Check machine recipes and ensure all required ingredients are available

### Production Flow Issues
- Monitor assembling machine input resources to prevent production stoppages
- Keep material supply chains flowing by managing input/output chests
